thread.title: Chandler Parsons is always hanging out with beautiful women | New York Post
thread.title_full: Chandler Parsons is always hanging out with beautiful women | New York Post

author: Jaclyn Hendricks
title: Chandler Parsons is always hanging out with beautiful women | New York Post
text:
A post shared by Pausha Haghighi (@pausha) on Feb 17, 2017 at 11:04am PST 
Chandler Parson enjoyed the NBA All-Star break south of the border in “Chancun.”
Parsons and Thorne Courtesy of Terez Owens After jetting to Mexico with friends for the holiday weekend, the Grizzlies forward and social media aficionado naturally documented the getaway on Instagram and Snapchat, including rendezvous with bikini-clad beauties and a former Disney Channel star.
“When I’m up they gonna hate, when I’m down they gon celebrate,” he posted Sunday on Instagram alongside a few pals.
A few of Parsons’ female companions also shared bits of the weekend shenanigans on social, including the moment the shirtless 28-year-old got glitterfied by a gal pal. Terez Owens also captured shots of Hailey Baldwin’s rumored flame cozying up to actress Bella Thorne.
Thorne, who has come out as bisexual and was linked to pop star Charlie Puth in December, shared her heated moment with Parsons on Snapchat.
It appears Parsons’ womanizing ways aren’t slowing down in the new year. After striking out with Instagram beauties Paige Spiranac and Felicia Sanders, Parsons caught the eye of super model Kendall Jenner in January.
Help pic.twitter.com/aCqMCLBcuu 
— jena luckman (@JenaLuckman) February 17, 2017
